languages.text: "Этот мир не спасти — ересь исходит из самих его недр. Я объявляю планете экстерминатус. У Администратума будет несколько лет, чтобы забрать отсюда свое имущество, а после Тассеру очистит пламя".

"This world is beyond saving. Heresy exudes from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."
languages.original_text: "Этот мир не спасти — ересь исходит из самих его недр. Я объявляю планете экстерминатус. У Администратума будет несколько лет, чтобы забрать отсюда свое имущество, а после Тассеру очистит пламя".

traits.locale_text: "This world is beyond saving. Heresy rises from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

"This world is beyond saving. Its very bowels exude heresy. I hereby order thassertium destruction to commence immediately, and declare an Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given time to evacuate its property, after which Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

"This world is beyond saving. Heresy exudes from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

"This world is beyond saving. Heresy exudes from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

"This world is beyond saving. Its very bowels exude heresy. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given time to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

"This world is beyond saving. Its very bowels exude heresy. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given time to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

"This world is beyond saving. Heresy rises from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

languages.text: “这个世界已经无可救药了，到处散发着异端邪说的味道。我在此命令，立刻销毁所有塔瑟拉水晶，对这颗行星签发灭绝令。我会给内政部几年时间，让他们撤走他们的财产。等撤离结束后，就用烈焰净化整个塔瑟拉吧。”
languages.original_text: "This world is beyond saving. Heresy exudes from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

traits.locale_text: “这个世界已经无可救药了，到处散发着异端邪说的味道。我在此命令，立刻销毁所有塔瑟拉水晶，对这颗行星签发灭绝令。我会给内政部几年时间，让他们撤走他们的财产。等撤离结束后，就用烈焰净化整个塔瑟拉吧。”

languages.text: 「この惑星はもはや救いようがない。奥底から異端が染み出している。よって、直ちに全てのタッセリウムを破壊し、惑星に〈究極浄化〉を宣告する。帝国行政局には所有物の撤収の時間を与えるが、その後、タッセーラは火によって浄化されるだろう」
languages.original_text: "This world is beyond saving. Its very bowels exude heresy. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given time to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星はもはや救いようがない。奥底から異端が染み出している。よって、直ちに全てのタッセリウムを破壊し、惑星に〈究極浄化〉を宣告する。帝国行政局には所有物の撤収の時間を与えるが、その後、タッセーラは火によって浄化されるだろう」

languages.text: «Este mundo ya no tiene salvación. La herejía rezuma desde su mismísimo corazón. Ordeno la destrucción inmediata de todo el thassertio y declaro Exterminatus sobre el planeta. El Administratum dispondrá de unos años para evacuar sus propiedades, y después Thassera será purificada a fuego».
languages.original_text: "This world is beyond saving. Heresy exudes from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

traits.locale_text: «Este mundo ya no tiene salvación. La herejía rezuma desde su mismísimo corazón. Ordeno la destrucción inmediata de todo el thassertio y declaro Exterminatus sobre el planeta. El Administratum dispondrá de unos años para evacuar sus propiedades, y después Thassera será purificada a fuego».

languages.text: "Bu dünya kurtarılamaz. Kâfirlik her yanına sızmış. Tüm tasertiyumun derhâl yok edilmesini emrediyor ve gezegen için Eksterminatus ilanında bulunuyorum. Administratum'a mülklerini boşaltması için birkaç yıl tanınacak ve sonrasında Thassera, ateşle arındırılacak."
languages.original_text: "This world is beyond saving. Heresy exudes from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünya kurtarılamaz. Kâfirlik her yanına sızmış. Tüm tasertiyumun derhâl yok edilmesini emrediyor ve gezegen için Eksterminatus ilanında bulunuyorum. Administratum'a mülklerini boşaltması için birkaç yıl tanınacak ve sonrasında Thassera, ateşle arındırılacak."

languages.text: « Plus rien ne pourra sauver ce monde. L'hérésie exsude de ses entrailles. J'ordonne donc la destruction immédiate de tout son thassertium et condamne la planète à l'Exterminatus. Il sera laissé quelques années à l'Administratum pour évacuer sa propriété, après quoi Thassera sera purifiée par les flammes. »
languages.original_text: "This world is beyond saving. Heresy exudes from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

traits.locale_text: « Plus rien ne pourra sauver ce monde. L'hérésie exsude de ses entrailles. J'ordonne donc la destruction immédiate de tout son thassertium et condamne la planète à l'Exterminatus. Il sera laissé quelques années à l'Administratum pour évacuer sa propriété, après quoi Thassera sera purifiée par les flammes. »

languages.text: "Diese Welt ist nicht mehr zu retten. Ketzerei keimt aus ihren Tiefen auf. Hiermit ordne ich die sofortige Zerstörung des gesamten Thassertims an und erkläre den Planeten als Exterminatus. Das Administratum hat mehrere Jahre Zeit, seine Besitztümer auszulagern, ehe Thassera mittels Feuer gereinigt wird."
languages.original_text: "This world is beyond saving. Heresy exudes from its very depths. I hereby order the immediate destruction of all thassertium, and declare Exterminatus on the planet. The Administratum will be given several years to evacuate its property, after which, Thassera will be cleansed by fire."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Welt ist nicht mehr zu retten. Ketzerei keimt aus ihren Tiefen auf. Hiermit ordne ich die sofortige Zerstörung des gesamten Thassertims an und erkläre den Planeten als Exterminatus. Das Administratum hat mehrere Jahre Zeit, seine Besitztümer auszulagern, ehe Thassera mittels Feuer gereinigt wird."
